#summary Description of nxt_carlike stack

= Introduction =

This stack implements algorithm for self-parking Lego NXT robot. Stack uses lejos firmware for control robots and lcp_proxy for link robot with ROS 

<wiki:video url="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AZlVnxzhT9c"/>

= Details =

Run by follow steps:
  * Run lcp_proxy
{{{roslaunch lcp_proxy lcp_proxy.launch}}}
  * Run self-parking algorithm 
{{{roslaunch nxt_carlike nxt_parking.launch}}}
  * Public message 'StartP' 
{{{rostopic pub /parking std_msgs/String 'startP'}}}
